item.title: India great Kohli retires from Test cricket
item.description: Legendary India batter Virat Kohli retires from Test cricket with immediate effect.

item.title: What does the US-China tariff deal mean?
item.description: The agreement marks a major de-escalation of the trade war between the world's two biggest economies.

item.title: China has come to the table - but this fight is far from over
item.description: Beijing can claim its defiance has delivered them a battle victory in the trade war.

item.title: First white South Africans flying to US under Trump refugee plan
item.description: Donald Trump says they are victims of "racial discrimination", which is strongly denied by South Africa.

item.title: Pope calls for journalists to be released from prison
item.description: The new pontiff expressed solidarity with journalists who had been jailed for "reporting the truth".
